meanings.definition: A genus of African grasshoppers in the family Acrididae, subfamily Acridinae.
meanings.english_definition: A genus of African grasshoppers in the family Acrididae, subfamily Acridinae.

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek στενός (stenós, “narrow”) + κροταφίς (krotaphís, “temple”) + -ία (-ía, suffix forming abstract nouns).
